text: 6:8 Eze 14:21Aduga eina yengbada, maksinba machugi sagol ama eina ure. Madugi mathakta tongliba mahak adugi maming adu asiba kou-i aduga khamnung leibakna mahakki tung nakna illammi. Malemgi saruk mari thokpagi amagi mathakta lalna, chaktangbana, laina laichatna, amadi lamsasingna hatnaba makhoigi mathakta matik pire.
